TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProjectRootElement extends Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer

summary.span: 表示一个 MSBuild 项目、一个目标文件或任何其他符合 MSBuild 项目文件架构的文件。

span.span: Represents an MSBuild project, a targets file, or any other file that conforms to MSBuild project file schema.

summary.span: 通过此类及其相关类，可以读写完整的 MSBuild 项目或目标文件。

span.span: This class and its related classes allow a complete MSBuild project or targets file to be read and written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前不能通过此模型编辑注释和空格。Comments and white space cannot be edited through this model at present. 每个项目根元素只与一个项目集合关联。Each project root element is associated with exactly one project collection. 这允许该项目集合的所有者控制其生存期，而不会因来自其他项目集合的编辑而惊讶。This allows the owner of that project collection to control its lifetime and not be surprised by edits that come from another project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectImportElement AddImport(string project) cil managed
Public Function AddImport (project As String) As ProjectImportElement

span.span: The project to be imported.

summary.span: 向此项目中添加一个项目导入。

span.span: Adds a project import to this project.
The added project import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果导入组存在，则将项目导入插入不包含 Condition 特性的最后一个导入组;否则，在项目的末尾创建一个导入。If import groups exist, inserts the project import into the last import group that has no Condition attribute; otherwise, creates an import at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectImportGroupElement AddImportGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 在此项目的末尾创建一个导入组。

span.span: Creates an import group at the end of this project.

returns.span: 在此项目的末尾创建的导入组。

span.span: The import group created at the end of this project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此便利方法基于试探法选取 MSBuild DOM 中的位置。This convenience method picks a location in the MSBuild DOM based on a heuristic.

summary.span: 向此项目中添加项。

span.span: Adds an item to this project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String) As ProjectItemElement

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The item type of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: 要添加的项的 Include 值。

span.span: The Include value of the item to be added.

summary.span: 向此项目中添加项。

span.span: Adds an item to this project.
The added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个项，然后将其添加到不含 Condition 特性的项组和至少一个具有相同项类型的项。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果找不到此类项组，则将创建一个新的项组并向其添加项。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 项按包含值排序。Items are ordered by Include values. 如果项与此项类型的现有通配符表达式匹配，则不执行任何操作。Does nothing if the item matches an existing wildcard expression for this item type.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem (string itemType, string include, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string,string>> metadata);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, string>> metadata) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String, metadata As IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, String))) As ProjectItemElement

public: Microsoft::Build::Construction::ProjectItemElement ^ AddItem(System::String ^ itemType, System::String ^ include, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::String ^>> ^ metadata);

span.span: The item type of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: 要添加的项的 Include 值。

span.span: The Include value of the item to be added.
The metadata to be added.

summary.span: 向此项目中添加包含元数据的项。

span.span: Adds an item with metadata to this project.
The added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个项，然后将其添加到不含 Condition 特性的项组和至少一个具有相同项类型的项。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果找不到此类项组，则将创建一个新的项组并向其添加项。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 项按包含值排序。Items are ordered by Include values.

Public Function AddItemDefinition (itemType As String) As ProjectItemDefinitionElement

param.name: itemType
param.span: 要添加的项定义的项类型。

span.span: The item type of the item definition to be added.

summary.span: 向此项目中添加项定义。

span.span: Adds an item definition to this project.
The added item definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个项，然后将其添加到不含 Condition 特性的项组和至少一个具有相同项类型的项。Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type. 如果找不到此类项组，则将创建一个新的项组并向其添加项。If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it. 项按包含值排序。Items are ordered by Include values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemDefinitionGroupElement AddItemDefinitionGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 向此项目中添加项定义组。

span.span: Adds an item definition group to this project.
The added item definition group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建项定义组并将其添加到最后一个现有项定义组（如果有）之后。Creates and adds an item definition group after the last existing item definition group, if any. 否则，将在最后一个现有属性组之后创建项定义组（如果有）。Otherwise, creates an item definition group after the last existing property group, if any. 如果不存在任何属性组，则在项目的末尾创建一个新的项定义组。If no property group exists, creates a new item definition group at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemGroupElement AddItemGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 创建一个项组并将其添加到此项目中。

span.span: Creates and adds an item group to this project.
The added item group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建项组，并将其添加到最后一个现有项组（如果有）之后。Creates and adds an item group after the last existing item group, if any. 否则，将在最后一个现有属性组之后创建一个项组（如果有）。Otherwise, creates an item group after the last existing property group, if any. 如果不存在任何属性组，则在项目的末尾创建一个新的项组。If no property group exists, creates a new item group at the end of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyElement AddProperty(string name, string value) cil managed
Public Function AddProperty (name As String, value As String) As ProjectPropertyElement

param.name: name
param.span: 要更新或添加的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property to be updated or added.

param.name: value
param.span: 要更新或添加的属性的值。

span.span: The value of the property to be updated or added.

summary.span: 在此项目中更新或添加属性。

span.span: Updates or adds a property to this project.
The updated or added property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新具有指定 `name` 的最后一个现有属性，该属性对自身或包含它的属性组具有不具有 Condition 特性的指定。Updates the last existing property with the specified `name` that has no Condition attribute on itself or on the property group that contains it. 否则，将创建一个属性，并将其添加到不具有 Condition 特性的第一个属性组。Otherwise, creates a property and adds it to the first property group that has no Condition attribute. 如果不存在这样的属性组，将在最后一个现有属性组之后创建一个属性组（如果有），并向其添加属性。If no such property group exists, creates a property group after the last existing property group, if any, and adds the property to it . 否则，将创建属性组并将其添加到项目开头，并向其添加属性。Otherwise, creates and adds a property group to the start of the project, and adds the property to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyGroupElement AddPropertyGroup() cil managed

summary.span: 在此项目中添加新属性组。

span.span: Adds a new property group to this project.
The added property group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建属性组，并将其添加到最后一个现有属性组（如果有）之后。Creates a property group and adds it after the last existing property group, if any. 否则，会将属性组添加到项目的开头。Otherwise, adds the property group to the start of the project.

summary.span: 获取从指定文件路径加载到内存中的全局项目集合中的项目根。

span.span: Gets the project root in the global project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

returns.span: 项目根；如果未从指定文件路径加载项目到内存中，则返回 。

span.span: The project root, or if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ProjectRootElements 可能会因为内存不足而被丢弃。It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure. 如果 TryOpen 返回 null，则不表示尚未加载项目根，只是它当前不在内存中。If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement TryOpen(string path, class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection projectCollection) cil managed

span.span: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be .

param.name: projectCollection
param.span: 要在其中搜索项目根的项目集合。

span.span: The project collection to search for the project root.

summary.span: 获取从指定文件路径加载到内存中的指定项目集合中的项目根。

span.span: Gets the project root in the specified project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

returns.span: 项目根；如果未从指定文件路径加载项目到内存中，则返回 。

span.span: The project root, or if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ProjectRootElements 可能会因为内存不足而被丢弃。It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure. 如果 TryOpen 返回 `null` 则不表示尚未加载项目根，只是它当前不在内存中。If TryOpen returns `null` it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UsingTasks As ICollection(Of ProjectUsingTaskElement)

summary.span: 在此项目中获取所有子 UsingTask 元素 (MSBuild)。

span.span: Gets all child UsingTask Element (MSBuild) in this project.

value.span: 此项目中的所有子 UsingTask 元素。

span.span: All child UsingTask elements in this project.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取此对象的版本号。

span.span: Gets the version number of this object.

value.span: 此对象的版本号。

span.span: The version number of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此版本号与存储的版本号进行比较，以确定项目 XML 内容是否已更改，即使在更改后保存了项目也是如此。Compare this version number to a stored version number to determine whether the project XML content has changed, even if the project is saved after the change. 编辑可以多次递增版本号，因此，只应将版本与存储的值进行比较。An edit may increment the version number more than once, so Version should only be compared to a stored value.
